title: Dodging in ARAM
body:
This is a regular occurrence when people don't get the champs they want.

Could it be made so that your next champion is stored, and only changes on playing a ARAM game as that champion or rerolling. This way even if you dodge, you still have the same champion.

replies.body:
Considering ARAM is most of what i did for the IP weekend, i don't understand what your on about, we did maybe 20+ games in the course of the weekend, and there was 2 dodges, 1 was us because we'd gotten a fifth friend come on and decided we'd just wait the 5 minutes, and 1 was possibly this.

Not to mention this has been said before and doesn't work, several people dodge with champion X, and all bring champion X into one ARAM, game dies.

> If people dodge too much, they (should) get banned temporarily.

they do though.
not actually banned, but they have to wait a few mins before rejoining que.
They do get time bans, are you not aware of this?
That's if they dodge to many times with in a short time period.
No it's every single dodge you do gets a time ban.
oh okay, although sometimes I dodge 3 games in arrow(because internet problems at certain times) and only have the 5 min ban I'm kinda confused on how the riot dodge timers work.

no i think that when you reroll once or twice if you dodge you lose rerolls forever, i think thats a good punishment. dodging in aram needs to be dealt with the same as with rift, you should be able to do it if theres someone whos probably gonna afk/feed but punish the ones that do it just like that even more

Good idea though it would have to store at least 5 champions (prioritised based on which was stored first of course) so when two or more people with the same stored champion end up matched onto the same team it still has a champion to give everyone.
